element.definition: The specific person or organization who is participating/expected to participate in the care plan.
element.comments: Patient only needs to be listed if they have a role other than "subject of care".  Member is optional because some participants may be known only by their role, particularly in draft plans.

mapping.map: REL.5 (or PRT-5 : ( PRV-4 {provider participations} ) / PRT-5 : ( PRV-4  {non-provider person participations} ) / PRT-5 : ( PRV-4 = (patient non-subject of care) ) / PRT-8?)
